item.description:
Please take a moment to read the ENTIRE update, as I have updated the new meetup dates/locations.
MEETUPS AT 1:00PM



Please note our next SUNDAY meetup will be held at Doggie Day @ 1PM .
Due to the colder weather we will be taking our meetups strictly indoors for the next few months. Our next meetup will be our Holiday get together. So feel free to dress your pooch in his/hers finest winter wear. The more festive the better. Stay tuned as there will be upcoming updates of Holiday event including the annual pet photos with Santa held at Doggie Day.

The MSPCA has also started collecting donations for the annual giving tree! All for a great cause. Please see http://www.mspca.org/...

If you have note already, donations are still being accepted for Jonah the chihuahua, who received life saving surgery a few weeks back. http://www.mspca.org/...



Once again, A very special thanks to Kim (our resident photographer) and all others who take great photos for our website every meetup, check back often as your pet may be featured!



Indoor meetup will be held at Doggie day (1-3pm)


Should anyone have any questions, feel free to contact me.
Susana
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua February Meetup
